casebody.data:
Susan NORMAN
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION. No. 52P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2004. William H. Borden, Special Deputy Attorney General, for NC DOT. Daniel J. Park, Elkin, for Norman. Prior report: 161 N.C.App. 211 , 588 S.E.2d 42 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 12th day of February 2004 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review as to additional issues of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of April 2004."
